label: History
title: Paxaro App <1 /> in theory and in practice

description1.text1: The influence of Bitcoin on the cryptocurrency market is declining and will continue to decline
description1.text2: In the case of alternative coins, you are more likely to buy stocks than currency. Each of them is a technology that solves a specific problem - it looks like investing in a startup.

description2.text1: Projects with a capitalization lower than Bitcoin have a higher potential growth. Alternative tokens, which have an advantage in terms of cost and transaction speed, increase interest in the industry. Such companies can gain a capitalization of over $1 billion in a relatively short period of time.

description3.text1: The industry is growing, and so is the index. Over the past five years, Bitcoin has grown <1>144 times</1>, and the Paxaro App indices have shown profitability <4>700+ times*</4>. With the Paxaro App, you cover up to <6>95%</6> of the market capitalization of cryptocurrencies - the index is constantly updated and you are always at the top of the industry.
description3.text2: * The period from 01/03/2016 to 03/11/2021 according to Coinmarketcap data, more than 5000 variants of backtests and tests were carried out.
